title: Projects
text:
Here is a selection of my projects, ranging from data analytics dashboards to AI pipelines and web crawlers.






Rift Dashboard


Rift Dashboard
A full-stack League of Legends analytics dashboard for meta trends, rank disparities, and summoner profiling.





AI NPC LangGraph


AI NPC LangGraph
A retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipeline for RPG NPCs built with LangGraph and LangChain. Features sentiment analysis, dynamic lore retrieval, and a custom “LLM-as-a-Judge” benchmarking suite for evaluating hallucination and context precision.







Deep MER Clustering (MSc Thesis)


Deep MER Clustering
My Master’s Thesis: A complete pipeline for Music Emotion Recognition (MER) combining unsupervised clustering, Large Language Models (LLMs), and parameter-efficient Deep Learning. This project bridges the semantic gap between human perception and raw acoustic features using LLM-assisted clustering and a dual-branch Deep Learning architecture.





Humanitarian Crisis in Gaza Strip


Humanitarian Crisis Website
A website dedicated to providing insightful data visualizations on the Palestinian conflicts and humanitarian crisis (Oct 2023 - Apr 2024). Features interactive maps, time-series charts, and analysis of commodity prices and water quality to foster informed dialogue.







TikTok Crawler


TikTok Crawler
TikTok Crawler using BeautifulSoup and Selenium to gather data.

I am a Data Scientist with a background in Computer Science and a desire toward building products. What keeps me engaged in this field is its multi-modality; I enjoy the challenge of adapting to different domains, whether that means analyzing sleep patterns via EEG, interpreting music mood through Deep Learning, or engineering RAG systems for dynamic narratives.
Currently, I serve as a Task Leader for EU-funded research projects, where I implement Deep Learning algorithms with a focus on Explainable AI (xAI). While this work has honed my technical rigor—culminating in a workshop presentation in Bologna—my professional focus is shifting beyond the academic sphere.
I find the most satisfaction in the engineering side of Data Science: designing the architecture, handling the pipeline, and delivering a tangible, functional MVP. I am looking for opportunities to bring this end-to-end skillset to a product-focused environment.

title: Panagiotis Zazos
text:
Technical Arsenal



Product Engineering

GenAI Systems: Designing RAG architectures and evaluation frameworks for reliable narrative generation.
Full-Cycle Development: Engineering end-to-end data products, from database schema design to containerized deployment.
Data Pipelines: Building robust acquisition systems for structured and unstructured web data.





Deep Learning & Research

Multi-Modal Analysis: Synthesizing insights from diverse data sources, including audio spectrograms, time-series, and text.
Model Interpretability: Implementing xAI methodologies to ensure model transparency and trust in critical domains.
Transfer Learning: Leveraging adapter-based fine-tuning to efficiently specialize foundation models for domain-specific tasks.





Game Data Science

Gameplay Analytics: Analyzing match telemetry to quantify player behavior, engagement patterns, and churn risks.
Meta & Balance: Evaluating itemization efficiency, win-rate trends, and economy flow to optimize game fairness.
System Design: Applying statistical rigor to game mechanics, such as matchmaking logic and progression curves.





Hobbies

Video Games: Enthusiast of competitive and complex games, where i naturally enjoy diving into the numbers behind the meta and game economies.
Audio Production: I am an amateur musician armed with an electric guitar and experiment with MIDI to layer beats and ambient textures.

Cross-fit: To clear my mind i am committed to high-intensity functional training and personal discipline through cross-fit and functional training.
